# rstuff

rstuff is a collection of stuff I use in my day-to-day R work.

## Installation

You can install the package directly from Github:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
# pak::pak("devtools")
devtools::install_github("joshwlivingston/rstuff")
```

## Formatting

This package uses air, an R formatter and language server available as
an extension in both vscode and positron. The IDE and extension will
pickup the settings specified in .vscode/settings.json and air.toml

# Package index

## All functions

- [`check_logical_length_one()`](https://joshwlivingston.github.io/rstuff/reference/class-length-checks.md)
  [`check_character_length_one()`](https://joshwlivingston.github.io/rstuff/reference/class-length-checks.md)
  [`check_null_or_character_length_one()`](https://joshwlivingston.github.io/rstuff/reference/class-length-checks.md)
  : Function class and length checks
- [`create_github_pkgdown()`](https://joshwlivingston.github.io/rstuff/reference/create_github_pkgdown.md)
  : Create a Github Repo
- [`create_github_repo()`](https://joshwlivingston.github.io/rstuff/reference/create_github_repo.md)
  : Create a Github Repo
- [`create_project()`](https://joshwlivingston.github.io/rstuff/reference/create_project.md)
  : Create a New R Project
- [`get_con_duckdb()`](https://joshwlivingston.github.io/rstuff/reference/get_con_duckdb.md)
  : Duckdb Database Connection
